member.name: T:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.ElectionController
member.summary: The API controller in charge of the election system

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.ElectionController.Leader
member.summary: Returns the current leader, if any.

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.ElectionController.IsElectionRunning
member.summary: Returns a bool indicating whether an election is currently running.

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.ElectionController.Current
member.summary: Returns a summary of the currently running election, if any.

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.ElectionController.Previous
member.summary: Returns a list of all completed elections.

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.ElectionController.GetById(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns the election with the given id.

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.ElectionController.ListActivity(System.Double,System.Double,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Returns a list of election related events ocurring during the given period, sorted by when they occurred. Types of events are:
started
ended
candidateJoined
votedOn by one or more people (event time will be time of the earliest vote within time period)
commentedOn by one or more people (event time will be time of the earliest comment within time period)
member.param: The lower bound of the time period. Default is 0.
The upper bound of the time period. Default is now.
Whether to count a player changing their vote as a new vote. Default is true.

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.ElectionController.GetPlayerActivity(System.String,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns a summary of a player's election related activity within the given time range.
member.param: The username of the player in question.
The lower bound on the time range. Default is 0.
The upper bound on the time range. Default is now.

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.ElectionController.TownhallConstructed
member.summary: Will eventually return whether a town hall has been constructed in the world. Currently returns true.

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.ElectionController.Votes(System.Nullable{System.Guid})
member.summary: Returns a list of votes that were made on the indicated election.
member.param: The guid of the election in question.

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.ElectionController.Vote(Eco.WebServer.DataTransferObjects.RunoffVote,System.String)
member.summary: Places a vote on behalf of the given player. Can only be called if an election is currently running.
member.param: The player's vote. Must contain a ranked list of all candidates for the current election.
The player's authtoken
member.returns: A failure code if the vote is invalid, the player is not authorized, or the vote cannot be placed for another reason.

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.ElectionController.CanAddCandidate(System.String)
member.summary: Returns whether the given user is legally able to run in the current election if there is one, or create a new election and run in it if there isn't one.

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.ElectionController.AddCandidate(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds the given user as a candidate for the current election. If there is no election currently ongoing, a new election is started.
member.param: The user's candidate speech for this election
The user's authtoken
member.returns: A failure code if the user is not authorized

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.ElectionController.RemoveCandidate(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the given candidate from the currently ongoing election.
member.param: The user's authcode
member.returns: A failure code if the user could not be authorized or was not a candidate in a currently running election.

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.ElectionController.ForceElectionEnd(System.String)
member.summary: Forces the currently running election to end now, and for the current election winner to become the leader. Can only be called by an admin or dev.
member.param: The user's authtoken
member.returns: A failure code if the user is not authorized, or if there is no election currently running

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.ElectionController.AddComment(Eco.Webserver.DataTransferObjects.ChatMessage,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a comment to the currently running election, if any.
member.param: The comment to be added to the election
The user's authtoken
member.returns: A failure code if the user is not authorized or there is no election running.

member.name: T:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.LawController
member.summary: The API controller in charge of the law system

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.LawController.ListLaws
member.summary: Returns all laws currently present in the game - that is, all active laws and all laws that are currently being voted on.

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.LawController.ListFailedLaws
member.summary: Returns all proposed laws whose voting period has ended and which were not passed.

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.LawController.ListLawActivity(System.Double,System.Double,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Returns a list of law related events ocurring during the given period, sorted by when they occurred. Types of events are:
proposed
passed
failed
votedOn by one or more people (event time will be time of the earliest vote within time period)
commentedOn by one or more people (event time will be time of the earliest comment within time period)
member.param: The lower bound of the time period. Default is 0.
The upper bound of the time period. Default is now.
Whether to count a player changing their vote as a new vote. Default is true.

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.LawController.GetPlayerActivity(System.String,System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns a summary of a player's law related activity within the given time range.
member.param: The username of the player in question.
The lower bound on the time range. Default is 0.
The upper bound on the time range. Default is now.

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.LawController.CanAddLaw(System.String)
member.summary: Returns whether this user is currently allowed to propose a law.
member.param: The authtoken of the user in question

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.LawController.GetLaw(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns the law with the specified id.
member.param: Unique ID of the law

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.LawController.AddLaw(Eco.Webserver.DataTransferObjects.AddLawCommand)
member.summary: Proposes a new law, using the saved law logic draft for this user.
member.param: New law data. Logic is required, all others are optional.
member.returns: A failure code if the law cannot be added.

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.LawController.AddComment(Eco.Webserver.DataTransferObjects.ChatMessage,System.Guid,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a comment to a given law.
member.param: The comment structure itself.
The GUID of the law
Authtoken of the user.
member.returns: A failure code if the comment cannot be added.

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.LawController.GetComments(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns comments for a law
member.param: Id of the law

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.LawController.ForceAddAllLaws(System.String)
member.summary: Sets all proposed laws into effect. Can only be done by a dev or admin.
member.param: The authtoken of the user.
member.returns: A failure code if the user was unauthorized.

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.LawController.ClearLaws(System.String)
member.summary: Completely removes all proposed and active laws. Can only be done by a dev or admin.
member.param: The authtoken of the user.
member.returns: A failure code if the user was unauthorized.

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.LawController.CancelLaw(System.Guid,System.String)
member.summary: Cancel a law. Can only be done by a dev or admin.
member.param: GUID of the law
Authtoken of the user
member.returns: Ok if it was able to cancel the law

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.LawController.HandleVote(System.Guid,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Votes for or against a law.
member.param: Law that should be voted on
If the user is agreeing with the proposal, this ought to be true, otherwise false.
Authtoken of the user
member.returns: Nothing in data; status code 200 if the request was handled successfully, another code otherwise.

member.name: T:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.StatsController
member.summary: The API controller in charge of anything stats-y.

member.name: F:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.StatsController.MaximumSamples
member.summary: Maximum amount of samples sent at any time. Proprietary number taken over from the old stats host.

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.StatsController.GetTimeRange
member.summary: Returns the timerange of the simulation
member.returns: Range containing the timerange of the data, in days

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.StatsController.GetTreeList
member.summary: Returns all dataset keys, formatted as a tree. Each key is a list of strings. A key can be derived from the tree by following any path from a root KeyFragment to a leaf KeyFragment, adding each KeyFragment encountered to a list of strings.
member.returns: List of dataset keys, formatted like so: [{"KeyFragment":"CategoryA", "Children":["KeyFragment":"StatA", "Children":[ "KeyFragment":"PlayerA", "Children": [], "KeyFragment":"PlayerB", "Children": [] ]], "KeyFragment": ...]

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.StatsController.GetList
member.summary: Returns all dataset keys, formatted as a list, where each key is a list of strings.
member.returns: List of dataset keys, formatted like so: [["CategoryA", "StatA", "PlayerA"], ["CategoryB", "StatB"], ...]

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.StatsController.GetInfo(System.String[])
member.summary: Returns additional metadata associated with this dataset.
member.param: The key of the dataset.

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.StatsController.GetClassicList
member.summary: Classic list. Deprecated: Use treelist or flatlist instead.

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.StatsController.Get(System.String[],System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Returns data points between and of the selected data. If there are more than samples, it will be averaged out to contain exactly .
member.param: dataset to take the data from
Day from which on data is returned. Default is 0.
Day until which data is returned. Default is now.
member.returns: A list of floats that returns the data. Might be averaged out if there were too many data points.

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.StatsController.Package(System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String[]})
member.summary: Returns a "package" of multiple statistics in the order of their request.
member.param: Day from which the data should be taken from. Default is 0.
Day until which data is returned. Default is now.
A list of statistics that should be returned
member.returns: The statistics to each of the sets, or null if not found, in the order of their request.

member.name: M:Eco.Webserver.Web.Controllers.StatsController.Graphs
member.summary: Returns the list of premade graphs to be displayed on the front page.

member.summary: Generates fake stat data for testing.
member.param: The number of days to simulate.
The number of users to simulate.
Whether to generate climate data. Default is false.
How much pollution to generate. Default is 1.

member.name: T:Eco.WebServer.Web.Controllers.AdminController
member.summary: Admin Controller

member.name: M:Eco.WebServer.Web.Controllers.AdminController.Access(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets how accessible this server is. Authtoken from client. Can be 'public' (available on public server registry), 'private' (requires a password), or 'hidden' (no password, but not on server registry). If setting private, must set a password. If not set to private, this is unused.

member.name: T:Eco.WebServer.Web.Controllers.WorldLayerController

member.summary: Enumerates the layers that should be displayed when the user is focused on a particular layer and world area.
member.param: Name of the layer we're querying.
The least x boundary of the viewed area, in world coordinates. Should not be wrapped.
The least y boundary of the viewed area, in world coordinates. Should not be wrapped.
The greatest x boundary of the viewed area, in world coordinates. Should not be wrapped.
The greatest y boundary of the viewed area, in world coordinates. Should not be wrapped.
member.returns: An array of structures describing the layers that should be displayed.

The least y boundary of the viewed area, in world coordinates. Should not be wrapped.
The greatest x boundary of the viewed area, in world coordinates. Should not be wrapped.
The greatest y boundary of the viewed area, in world coordinates. Should not be wrapped.
member.returns: An string describing the requested area.
